snippet: The footage indicated that the terrorist network involved in the Paris attacks on Nov. 13 may also have wanted to obtain radioactive material.
abstract: Belgian authorities raise concerns over surveillance footage of high-ranking Belgian nuclear official found in home of Mohamed Bakkali, suspect linked to November 2015 Paris terror attacks; video suggests larger plot by members of Islamic State to obtain radioactive material for a terrorist attack.

byline.original: By MILAN SCHREUER and ALISSA J. RUBIN

lead_paragraph: The footage indicated that the terrorist network involved in the Paris attacks on Nov. 13 may also have wanted to obtain radioactive material.

headline.main: Video Found in Belgium of Nuclear Official May Point to Bigger Plot
headline.print_headline: Video Found in Belgium May Point to Bigger Plot

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
